Class HR

java.lang.Object
Person
Employee
HR
Direct Known Subclasses:
EmployeeInfoForm
public class HR extends Employee
Contains methods to do all the tasks related to HR and methods to help implement the tasks performed by the HR employees

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    HR()
    Initialize the EmployeeList treeMap and also loads all the employees stored in the file

  • Constructor Details

    • HR

      public HR()
      Initialize the EmployeeList treeMap and also loads all the employees stored in the file

  • Method Details

    • putEmployeeInList

      public void putEmployeeInList(String employeeId, Employee employee)
      Puts an employee to the EmployeeList treemap mapping each employee to their employee ID
      Parameters:
      employeeId - A unique employee ID assigned to each employee
      employee - an object of Employee class representing an employee at the firm

    • createEmployee

      public void createEmployee()
      Calls EmployeeInfoForm to get data of an employee to register them in the system

    • removeEmployee

      public void removeEmployee(String employeeID) throws NoSuchFieldException
      removes an employee from the EmployeeList treemap and also updates the employee record stored in the file accordingly
      Parameters:
      employeeID - unique id of employee that is to be removed
      Throws:
      NoSuchFieldException - if employee is not found

    • exportEmployee

      public void exportEmployee(String fileName)
      Stores the constructor values needed to recreate the employee to a file. By doing so this function essentially stores the employee object to the file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file in which this data is to be stored

    • getPay

      public String getPay(String employeeId) throws NoSuchFieldException
      Get pay of the employee
      Parameters:
      employeeId - Unique employee ID who's pay is enquired
      Returns:
      pay of the employee whose employeeID was provided in the parameters
      Throws:
      NoSuchFieldException - if employee is not found

    • setBranchCode

      public void setBranchCode(String employeeId, String branchCode) throws NoSuchFieldException
      Setter for branch code
      Parameters:
      employeeId - unique employee ID of the employee whose branch code is to be changed
      branchCode - branch code that is to be set
      Throws:
      NoSuchFieldException - if employee is not found

    • getPaySheet

      public String getPaySheet()
      gets pay sheet of all the employees registered in the firm
      Returns:
      a string with pay of all the employees in the firm

    • changePay

      public void changePay(String employeeId, String pay) throws NoSuchFieldException
      Change the pay of an employee
      Parameters:
      employeeId - unique employee id of the employee whose pay is to be changed.
      pay - the updated value of pay
      Throws:
      NoSuchFieldException - if employee is not found

    • viewEmployee

      public String viewEmployee(String employeeId) throws NoSuchFieldException
      Shows information of an employee
      Parameters:
      employeeId - unique employee id of the employee whose info is to be returned
      Returns:
      a string with printable information of the employee
      Throws:
      NoSuchFieldException - if employee is not found

    • containsEmployee

      public boolean containsEmployee(String employeeId)
      Tells if an employee ID already exist in the system
      Parameters:
      employeeId - Employee ID in question
      Returns:
      true if the employee already exist in the system, false otherwise
